title: An Act mitigating MBTA Communities funding impact for First Responders and Education

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Robertson of Tewksbury, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2327) of David Allen Robertson relative to funding for public safety and education for certain Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority communities.  Municipalities and Regional Government.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

related_entities.name: committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 07/29/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in Gardner Auditorium
